Title: Chronic PPI Use Weakens Bones, but Only in Men
Teaser: A study found a significant relationship between chronic proton pump inhibitor use and lower trabecular bone scores and bone mineral density in males, but not females.

Title: Mastitis in Older Women Linked to Subsequent Breast Cancer
Teaser: Their risk is increased by 73% in a large German retrospective cohort study.

Title: Abnormal HR Shifts Tied to Risk for Death in Diabetes
Teaser: A reduction in 24-hour heart rate variations was linked to twice the risk for long-term cardiovascular death, while the inability to reduce heart rate during sleep was linked to 39% increased risk.

Title: AI-Based Breast Cancer Screening Will Save Lives & Money
Teaser: Most benefit is from risk-stratified screening, with annual screening for high-risk individuals to every 6 years for those at lowest risk.

Title: Demographics Linked to Worse Access to Cardiac Surgery
Teaser: Women, Black people, and poor people were less likely to undergo major heart surgery.

Title: Monthly Semaglutide Goal: The End of Daily Pills?
Teaser: An injectable hydrogel provided a sustained release of semaglutide for 1 month in rats, according to preclinical testing of an experimental longer-acting formulation.

Title: Join Dr Julie Oliver and the Primary Care Women’s Health Forum at Guidelines Live 2024
Teaser: In anticipation of Guidelines Live 2024, the PCWHF provides a taster of its sessions in the Women’s Health Stream, which will address key issues around menopause and HRT

Title: Rheumatoid Arthritis: Whole-Food Diet May Be Protective
Teaser: The more ultra-processed foods a person consumed, the higher their risk for the inflammatory autoimmune disease.

Title: Top Tips: Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
Teaser: Dr Roger Henderson provides seven top tips for primary care practitioners on the diagnosis and management of polycystic ovary syndrome

Title: Should Genetic Testing Be Routine for Breast Cancer?
Teaser: Offering universal genetic testing to newly diagnosed breast cancer patients may identify germline pathogenic variants, which traditional risk-based criteria may miss.

Title: A1c Inaccurate in Defining Diabetes "Overtreatment"
Teaser: Regardless the A1c-based proxy definition used, sensitivity and accuracy were low in predicting hypoglycaemia based on continuous glucose monitor readings in older adults.

Title: Antibiotics May Not Abbreviate Fever in Paediatric Strep
Teaser: And complications in the placebo group were treatable.

Title: Anaesthetics Safely Attenuate BPG Injection Pain
Teaser: Post-injection pain significantly reduced by anaesthetics.

Title: Migraine: When Triptans Don't Work
Teaser: Nearly two thirds of adult migraineurs met criteria for non-response to these drugs used to treat acute attacks.

Title: Aggressive and Agitated Behaviour: De-escalate and Consider Potential Causes
Teaser: Dr Victoria Eugenia Galvis explores approaches to consultations with patients experiencing emotional dysregulation, advocating methods that promote resolution and understanding

Title: And Never the Twain Shall Meet: HCPs, Patients, & IBD
Teaser: Healthcare professionals urged to reduce corticosteroids in inflammatory bowel disease, better align with patients.

Title: Psoriasis: Will It Progress to Arthritis?
Teaser: In a primary care population, the annual incidence of progression was low during the first few years of follow-up.

Title: Dr Emma Nash Looks Ahead to the Mental Health Stream at Guidelines Live 2024
Teaser: Dr Emma Nash outlines the topics that will be covered in the Mental Health Stream at Guidelines Live 2024, which include ADHD and trauma-informed care
